title: Full-Size Appliances, Patios/Balconies, Walk-In Closets
posting_body: ['Glendale Park is a 13-story seniors only building catering to those 55-years of age and over and who have low to very low income.', ' Glendale offers two different one-bedroom floor plans and offers monthly activities, great views of Memphis, relaxing balconies and professional management.', '  Come take a tour today and see for yourself why our seniors love us!', '-Professional Management Team', '-Resident Lounge', '-Maintenance On-Site', '-Common Areas Monitored by 24-Hour Video Surveillance', '-High Speed Internet Access', '-Disability Access', '-Automatic Payment Options Available', '-Secured Access', '-BBQ & Picnic Area', '-Laundry Facilities on Each Floor', '-Generous Resident Referral Program', '-Master Card, Visa, & Discover Cards Accepted', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
